channel.title: maya help
channel.description: downloaded maya 30 minutes ago and i've just come to a problem :stuck_out_tongue: i created an donut shaped polygon and drew up a donut texture on paint,now how do i apply the texture to the faces of the polygon? also,if you know any noob helping sites send me links please thank you for your support,bmf is surely a great community not only for black mesa related stuff :3
